22.4. [Florus of Lyon] Collectanea in Epistolas Pauli.
Collectanea | Pauline Epistles
Manuscripts:
1. Amiens, Bibliothèque municipale 82, f. 1-162v. saec. xii. Selincourt.
2. Angers, Bibliothèque municipale 65. (S)
3. Angers, Bibliothèque municipale 66 (58). saec. ix; St. Aubin. (S)
4. Arras, Bibliothèque municipale 22. saec. xii. Attributed to Bede.
5. Arras, Bibliothèque municipale 178 (1047), f. 1-69. saec. xii; St. Eloi. (S)
6. Autun, Bibliothèque municipale S 35 (31). saec. x. (S) But D. Iogna Prat attributes this text to Haimo of Auxerre, see below
7. Auxerre, Saint-Etienne 3. saec. xii2. Fragment. Cf. M. Peyrafort, "Un nouveau fragment du commentaire augustinien de Florus de Lyon sur les Epîtres de Saint Paul," Revue des études augustiniennes 33 (1987):133-136.
8. Avranches, Bibliothèque municipale 86. saec. xii (before 1186). Cat. des MSS datés VII, 444. Mont-St.-Michel.
9. Bamberg, Staatsbibliothek Bibl. 126 (B.I.8). saec. xi. Cluny. Saint-Odilon. (S)
10. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek - Preussischer Kulturbesitz Theol. lat. fol. 340-341 (Rose 347), 223 ff; 216; ff. 150. saec. xii4/4; Liesborn. (S)
11. Bologna, Archginnasio A 960. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. (S)
12. Bruges, Stadtbibliothek 79, f. 1-168. On Romans. (S)
13. Bruges, Stadtbibliothek 82, f. 1-180. saec. xii; Dunes. Attributed to Florus in MS. Gal.-Hebr. (S)
14. Brussels, Bibliothèque royale 9369 (V. d.G. 283). saec. xi. Saint-Laurent de Liège. Attributed to Florus in MS. (S)
15. Cambrai, Bibliothèque municipale 535. St. Aubert. Attributed to Florus in MS. (S)
16. Cambridge, Trinity College 119 (B.4.5). saec. xi-xii: O: Préaux (Gameson) xii (James): P: Canterbury, Christ Church. Vol. II at Oxford, Bodleian 317. (S)
17.. Cologne, Dombibliothek 73, f. 1-165. saec. xii. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. (S)
18. Cologne, Stadtarchiv GB fol. 132, f. 85v-106v. (S)
19. Douai, Bibliothèque municipale 346. saec. xii; Anchin. (S)
20. Douai, Bibliothèque municipale 347. 1153; Marchiennes. (S)
21. Durham, Cathedral B II 34, f. 1-205. saec. xiii. I Cor.-Hebr. (S)
22. Erlangen 76, 1, f. 1-233. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. Romans. (S)
23. Erlangen 76, 2, f. 10194. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. Gal.-Col. (S)
24. Florence,Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana Conv. soppr. 305, f. 1-124. Rom.-I Cor. (S)
25. Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana Conv, soppr. 567, f. 1-162. Gal.-Hebr. (S)
26. Gent, Bibliotheek der Rijksuniversiteit 452 [94 (120)], f. 1-164. Cambron. Rom.-Gal. (S)
27. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 211. saec. xii. (S)
28. Heiligenkreuz, Stiftsbibliothek 33, f. 1-153. saec. xii. Florus, Gal.- Hebr. (S)
29. Heiligenkreuz, Stiftsbibliothek 81. saec. xii. 145 ff. (S)
30. Holkham Hall, Library of the Earl of Leicester, 133. saec. xvi. (S)
31. Laon, Bibliothèque municipale 105. saec. ix. Rom.-I Cor. (S)
32. Leipzig, Universitätsbibliothek 164, f. 1-150. saec. xii/xiii. Florus, Rom. (S)
33. Leipzig, Universitätsbibliothek 166, f. 1-143. saec. xii/xiii. Florus, I Cor. (S)
34. Lisbon, Biblioteca Nacional xxx/368. saec. xii ex. 261 ff. (S)
35. London, British Library Burney 38. saec. xiii. P: Paris, St. Denis.                                         35. London, British Library Royal 4 C 4, f. 1-182. saec. xii. Romans. (S)
37. Lyon, Bibliothèque municipale 484 (414). saec. ix1. Autograph manuscript. II Cor, 1,12-Hebr.7,4. (S)
38. Madrid, Biblioteca Nacional 73 (213; A 70), f. 1-159. Rom.-I Cor. (S)
39. Mantua, Biblioteca Communale B V 10. saec. ix: Padolirone. Inc.: Primum quaeritur: Cur post evangelia, quae supplementum legis sunt et in quibus nobis exempla et praecepta; (Paulus servus) - Paulus Apostolus qui cum Saulus prius vocaretur, non ob aliud quantum mihi videtur, hoc nomen elegit: -Multifarie - Erat ille dominus prophetarum, impletor prophetarum, sanctificator prophetarum; Expl.: bonum operemur, ut simul de mercede gaudeamus per eum qui vivit etc.; Paulus ... constat Paulum ad fidem venisse. (S)
40. Monte Cassino, Archivio della Badia 39C. saec. xi. (S)
41. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek clm 4516. saec. xii3/3; Benediktbeuron. 166 ff. I-II Cor. No attribution in MS. Klemm, 201. (S)
42. Nîmes, Bibliothèque municipale 36. saec. xi ex.; Abbaye de la Grasse. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. (S)
43. Nurenberg I 52, f. 1-60. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. I-II Cor., f. 61-143: Romans. (S)
44. Orléans, Bibliothèque municipale 83. saec. ix. Fleury. (S)
45. Oxford, Balliol College, 178. saec. xii. Attributed to Bede. (S)
46. Oxford, Bodleian Library SC 2708 (Bodl. 317). saec. xii. Canterbury, Christ Church. II Cor.-Hebr. Vol. I: Cambridge, Trinity College 119. (S)
47. Oxford, Bodleian Library SC 3570 (e Museo 9), f. 1-44. saec. xii; St. Edmund's. Rom.-I Cor. Attributed to Bede. (S)
48. Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud Misc. 162, f. 1-214. saec. xii. Rom., I Cor. No attribution in MS. (S)
49. Oxford, Exeter College 18. saec. xii.
50, Oxford, Lincoln College 108, f. 1-205. saec. xv. II Cor.-Hebr. (S)
51. Oxford, Magdalen College lat. 140. saec. xvex. Romans – I Corinthians.
52. Padua, Biblioteca Antoniana III, f.1-151v. saec. xi. Florus? Rom.- Eph. Inc.: Paulus apostolus qui cum Saulus prius vocaretur; Memento de synagoga fuisse arietos, quorum filii sumus. (S)
53. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2363. saec. xii-xiii. Pars. 2.
54. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2364. saec. xii-xiii. Pars. 2.
55. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2365. saec. xii-xiii. II epistolae Pauli ad Corinthios.
56. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2371, f. 267-383. saec. xiv. Romans and I Cor. (PL 119: 279-352)
57. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2418. saec. xii. Rom. - Philem. (S)
58. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 11575-11576. saec. xii. Corbie. Attributed to Florus in MS. (S)
59. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 15600. saec. xii. Sorbonne.
60. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 17452, f. 1-155. Rom. Attributed to Bede. (S)
61. Paris, Bibliothèque Universitaire, 175. saec. xii. Attributed to Bede. (S)
62. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 119-120. saec. xii ex. Saint-Thierry. Rom. I-II Cor. Attributed to Bede. (S)
63. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 121 (E.341). saec. xiii. Rom.-I Cor. (S)
64. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 122. St. Thierry. Gal.-Hebr. Attributed to Florus. (S)
65. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 124 (E.267). saec. xii. St. Thierry.
66. Rouen, Bibliothèque municipale 464 (A437). Fécamp. Attributed to Augustine. (S)
67. Rouen, Bibliothèque municipale 530-1 (A.84 and A.98). saec. xii1; Jumièges. Cat. des MSS datés VII, 519. Attributed to Augustine. (S)
68. St. Gall, Stiftsbibliothek 279-281. 872-883. Attributed to Florus in MS. (S)
69. Saint-Omer, Bibliothèque municipale 24. saec. xii; Clairmarais.Attributed to Florus in MS. (S)
70. Saint-Omer, Bibliothèque municipale 25. saec. xii; Clairmarais. Attributed to Bede. (S)
71. Saint-Omer, Bibliothèque municipale 51. Saint-Bertin. (S)
72. Saint-Omer, Bibliothèque municipale 208. saec. xii. Clairmarais. Linked with MS 24 and MS 25 to form a complete set. (S)
73. Schlägl I (48), f. 200-294. I Cor. 1,1-II Cor., 12,15. (S)
74. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 96. saec. ix. St. Claude. St.-Oyan. No attribution in MS. (S)
75. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 236. saec. xii; Clairvaux. Attributed to Florus. (S)
76. Utrecht, Universiteitsbibliothek 202. saec. xii mid. 238 ff. (S)
77. Valencia, Universitat.1759 (392). saec. xv; S. Miguel de los Reyes. II Cor.-Hebr. (S)
78. Valenciennes, Bibliothèque municipale 87. saec. xii. Attributed to Bede.
79. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 4950. saec. xi late. Fonte Avellana. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. (S)
80. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 5730 (7530 in Heil, p. 339), saec. xi. Notre-Dame de Ripoll. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. (S)
81. Vendôme, Bibliothèque municipale 46, 1-79. saec. xii. Rom. I Cor. (S)
82. Venice, San Marco Z 29 (101). saec. xv. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli.
83. Würzburg, Univ. Mp. theol. Fol. 119, f. 1-240. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli. Romans. (S)
84. Zwettl, Cistercienserstift 49+51. saec. xii. Attributed to Peter of Tripoli in MS.
Erroneus attributions:
1. Cheltenham, Phillipps 3381. (S) = Paris, BnF n.a.l. 3074 is a copy of Florus’ epitome of Livy’s Roman History.
 Bibliography:
1. Mabillion, Veterum Analectorum tomus I, Paris, 1675, p. 12-21. Reprinted PL 90: col. 67-72.
2. Célestin Charlier, "La compilation augustinienne de Florus sur l'Apôtre," Revue Bénédictine 57 (1947): 132-186.
3. André Wilmart, "La collection de Bède le Vénérable sur l’Apôtre,” Revue Bénédictine 38 (1926), 16-52.
4. --,“Le mythe de Pierre de Tripoli," Revue Bénédictine 43 (1931): 347-352.
5. -- "Note sur Florus et Mannon à propos d'un travail récent," Revue Bénédictine 38 (1926), 214-216.
5. -- "Sommaire de l'Expositio de Florus sur les Epîtres," Revue Bénédictine 38 (1926), 205-214.
